name: language-postcss
readme: # Atom PostCSS language [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/azat-io/atom-language-postcss.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/azat-io/atom-language-postcss) Adds syntax highlighting to [PostCSS](https://github.com/postcss/postcss) `*.pcss` and `*.postcss` files in Atom. Contributions are greatly appreciated. Please fork this repository and open a pull request to make grammar tweaks, etc. ![](https://github.com/azat-io/atom-language-postcss/blob/master/features/postcss-atom.png?raw=true)
